Welcome to my blog! If you have found this page, the chances are you have an interest in at least one of the topics I plan to talk about; politics, faith, Formula One, football, or professional development. Whether you enjoy every section of this blog, or only just the topic that interests you, my hope is that you share my aspiration to stay curious, and keep asking the question “What does better look like?”
Happy reading!
